item.title: 中国概述振兴经济、结束房地产低迷的计划的主要启示
item.description: 市场热切关注中国为重振经济增长和结束房地产低迷所做努力的细节，以下是中国财政部部长蓝佛安和他的同事们今天在发布会上的五大要点。彭博终端的读者可点击这里查看全文。【原文：With markets keen for details on China’s efforts to revive economic growth and end its housing slump, here are five key takeaways from today’s briefing by Chinese Minister of Finance Lan Fo’an and his colleagues. Bloomberg Terminal readers can click here for a full transcript.】

item.title: 中国将出售特别主权债券以增加银行资本
item.description: 中国表示将发行特别主权票据，以增加其最大国有贷款机构的资本金。【原文：China said it will issue special sovereign notes to boost capital at its largest state-owned lenders.】

item.title: 贝恩向富士软发出具有约束力的收购要约，出价比 KKR 高出 7
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）对富士软件公司（Fuji Soft Inc.【原文：Bain Capital made a binding takeover proposal for Fuji Soft Inc. as it seeks to outmaneuver private equity rival KKR & Co., which has offered a lower price for the Japanese software developer.】

item.title: 中国允许地方政府利用债券购买未售出房屋
item.description: 中国将允许地方政府发行债券购买未售出的房屋，以支持萎靡不振的房地产行业，为经济放缓铺平道路。【原文：China will allow local governments to issue bonds to buy unsold homes to support the ailing property sector, as it pushes to put a floor under an economic slowdown.】

item.title: 新西兰将放宽外国投资法以吸引资本
item.description: 新西兰政府表示将放宽投资规定，以吸引更多外国资本，促进生产力增长。【原文：New Zealand’s government said it will loosen investment rules in a bid to attract more foreign capital and boost productivity growth.】

item.title: 力拓斥资 67 亿美元收购锂矿，迈向 M&A 救赎之路
item.description: 十多年前，力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）还在为灾难性投资的影响而苦苦挣扎。先是以市场最高价收购铝业集团加铝公司（Alcan Inc.大宗商品市场繁荣降温，高层管理者被赶走，减记堆积如山。【原文：A little over a decade ago, Rio Tinto Group was reeling from the impact of disastrous investments. First, the bruising top-of-the-market purchase of aluminum group Alcan Inc., and then the ill-conceived swoop for Mozambique-focused coal outfit Riversdale Mining Ltd. The commodities boom cooled, top managers were pushed out and writedowns piled up.】

item.title: 惠誉因赤字扩大将法国信用评级下调至负面
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）在法国政府提交 2025 年预算的第二天就将法国的前景展望定为负面，对总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）应对公共财政急剧恶化的努力提出了快速批评。【原文：Fitch Ratings put France on negative outlook a day after the government presented its 2025 budget, delivering a rapid critique of Prime Minister Michel Barnier’s efforts to deal with a sharp deterioration in public finances.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉人再次出逃推动达里恩峡谷过境人数增长 51
item.description: 尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）的连任引起争议后，越来越多的委内瑞拉人穿越险峻的丛林，9 月份通过达连峡谷的移民人数增加了 51%。【原文：The number of migrants coming through the Darien Gap increased by 51% in September as more Venezuelans crossed the treacherous jungle following Nicolas Maduro’s disputed reelection.】

item.title: 前杰富瑞基金经理回击 "卑鄙 "的欺诈诉讼
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）前对冲基金经理对一起欺诈诉讼进行了反击，该诉讼指控他在知情的情况下将该基金的 1 亿多美元资金投入了一个涉及水机的庞氏骗局。【原文：A former Jefferies Financial Group hedge fund manager pushed back on a fraud lawsuit accusing him of knowingly investing more than $100 million of the fund’s money in a Ponzi-like scheme involving water machines.】

item.title: 比利时债务飙升，穆迪将其前景展望降至负面
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将比利时的评级展望下调为负面，原因是人们对其赤字轨迹以及今年早些时候大选后的政治不确定性感到担忧。【原文：Belgium’s rating outlook was cut to negative by Moody’s Ratings amid concerns over its deficit trajectory as well as political uncertainty following general elections earlier this year.】

item.title: 套期保值的华尔街交易员仍对八月熔断耿耿于怀
item.description: 纵观当下市场，可谓一片欣欣向荣。股票创下历史新高，公司债券没有任何令人担忧的迹象，大宗商品在全球经济乐观情绪的推动下保持活跃。【原文：Take a snapshot of markets right now, and it’s a picture of health. Stocks are at records, corporate bonds show no signs of worry and commodities remain buoyant on global economic optimism.】

item.title: 对冲基金以八年来最快速度抛售对布伦特原油的押注
item.description: 由于战争风险加剧，对冲基金以近八年来最快的速度逃离对布伦特原油价格的看跌押注。【原文：Hedge funds fled bearish bets against Brent crude prices at the fastest pace in nearly eight years as war risks ratcheted up.】

item.title: 私募股权投资者占美国交易的 40
item.description: 2022 年，美国每五宗重大并购案中就有两宗涉及私募股权投资者，这一比例在过去二十年中稳步上升。【原文：Two out of every five major US mergers and acquisitions in 2022 involved private equity investors, a percentage that has steadily grown over the past two decades.】

item.title: ETF IQ：每 1 美元可赚 0.00146 美元
item.description: 欢迎收看 ETF IQ，这是一份专门报道 14 万亿美元全球 ETF 行业的周报。我是彭博新闻社记者兼主播凯蒂-格雷菲尔德（Katie Greifeld）。【原文：Welcome to ETF IQ, a weekly newsletter dedicated to the $14 trillion global ETF industry. I'm Bloomberg News reporter and anchor Katie Greifeld.】

item.title: 有线电视运营商 WideOpenWest 即将与贷款人就新贷款达成协议
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，WideOpenWest 公司即将与贷款方达成协议，筹集约 2 亿美元现金并重整债务状况。【原文：WideOpenWest Inc. is nearing a deal with lenders to raise around $200 million of cash and revamp its debt profile, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: CNX 股价飙升至十年新高，交易者却热衷于期权交易
item.description: 本周，CNX Resources Corp. 的股价创下 10 年新高，但至少有一位投资者仍在豪赌 CNX Resources Corp.【原文：At least one investor is making a big bet that CNX Resources Corp. will keep climbing even as the natural gas producer’s stock reached a 10-year high this week.】

item.title: 投资者权衡资产上限的长期成本，道明银行股价再次下跌
item.description: 周五，多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）股价再次下跌，两日跌幅达到 9%，此前该银行同意因洗钱合规失误而接受严厉处罚。【原文：Shares of Toronto-Dominion Bank fell again on Friday, bringing their two-day decline to 9%, after the lender agreed to stiff penalties for money-laundering compliance failures.】

item.title: 美国因以色列袭击事件扩大对伊朗石油部门的制裁
item.description: 美国宣布对伊朗的石油和石化行业实施新的制裁，以回应伊朗 10 月 1 日对以色列的弹道导弹袭击。【原文：The US announced new sanctions on Iran’s oil and petrochemicals sectors in response to the country’s Oct. 1 ballistic-missile attack on Israel.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 PIF 没有投资布拉瓦特尼克公司 Dazn 的计划
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金表示，目前没有计划投资亿万富翁伦-布拉瓦特尼克（Len Blavatnik）的流媒体集团 Dazn Group，该集团拥有欧洲一些顶级足球联赛的转播权。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund said it has no current plans to invest in billionaire Len Blavatnik’s streaming group Dazn Group, which holds the broadcasting rights of some of Europe’s top-tier football leagues.】

item.title: 投资者对中国经济刺激政策的期待
item.description: 本周中国市场走势坎坷，沪深 300 指数下跌 2.8%，公司债券反弹，各方都在关注周六举行的财政部政策吹风会，以寻找新财政刺激政策的线索。【原文：China’s markets rounded out a rocky week with a 2.8% slide in the CSI 300 Index and a rally in corporate bonds, as all eyes turn to the Ministry of Finance policy briefing on Saturday for clues on any fresh fiscal stimulus.】

item.title: 俄罗斯谷物出口商希望外国贸易商退出市场
item.description: 俄罗斯粮食出口商联盟呼吁将外国贸易商和中间商赶出俄罗斯的出口销售市场，因为莫斯科正继续试图加强对粮食流通的控制。【原文：Russia’s union of grain exporters called for foreign traders and intermediaries to be ousted from the country’s export sales, as Moscow continues to try and tighten its grip on flows.】

item.title: 象牙海岸总统希望在 2026 年前实现地区共同货币化
item.description: 象牙海岸总统阿拉萨内-瓦塔拉希望西非国家经济共同体成员国提前一年开始使用共同货币。【原文：Ivory Coast President Alassane Ouattara wants members of the Economic Community of West African States to start a common currency a year earlier than planned.】

item.title: 第六街和 Bridgepoint 是克莱因山的竞争者之一
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Sixth Street、Bridgepoint Group Plc 和 First Eagle Investment Management 等公司都在争相收购 Kline Hill Partners。【原文：Sixth Street, Bridgepoint Group Plc and First Eagle Investment Management are among suitors vying to acquire Kline Hill Partners, a firm focused on secondaries bets, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 奇趣通讯奥斯汀-古尔斯比讲述刚刚发生的故事
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 贝莱德携 4,500 亿美元另类资产加入新联盟
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的另类资产规模达到 4,500 亿美元，这使它全年都在宣传的一个观点更加清晰：它不仅仅是一家 ETF 强国。【原文：BlackRock Inc. reaching $450 billion in alternative assets is putting a finer point on a case it has been making all year: it’s not just an ETF powerhouse.】

item.title: 奥德赛就收购霍尼韦尔面罩部门进行深入谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Odyssey Investment Partners 正在就收购霍尼韦尔国际公司（Honeywell International Inc.【原文：Odyssey Investment Partners is in advanced talks to acquire Honeywell International Inc.’s personal protective equipment unit, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 上游生物股价上涨 26%，引领生命科学领域 IPO 热潮
item.description: 在投资者大力支持三家美国生命科学公司首次公开发行股票后，它们在早盘交易中的表现大多十分强劲。【原文：Three US life-sciences companies hitting the market delivered mostly robust early trading after investors strongly supported their initial public offerings.】

item.description:

。【原文：

In Metaphor: ReFantazio, the new game from the makers of Persona, you run in an election to become the next king

】

item.title: 飓风引发网上造谣者对选民身份的密谋
item.description:
州政府官员正在采取措施，确保最近的飓风不会阻碍任何人参加投票。【原文：

State officials are taking steps to ensure recent hurricanes won't prevent anyone from being able to vote.

】

item.title: 利率下降对摩根大通和富国银行来说并不像人们担心的那么糟糕
item.description: 几个月来，投资者一直担心美联储为美国经济软着陆所做的努力会给美国大型银行的盈利带来麻烦。【原文：For months, investors had been worried that the Federal Reserve’s effort to engineer a soft landing for the US economy would spell trouble for the earnings of big US banks.】
